Sports Club for You Who Revolves
Around the Airport

More Details Sports Club for You Who Revolves
Around the Airport More Details Sports Club for You Who Revolves
Around the Airport More Details Sports Club for You Who Revolves
Around the Airport More Details

Aeropolis Sports Club offers fitness center facilities, Olympic-size swimming pool, and Food & Beverage area. This range of fitness facilities will help you in keeping a healthy life.

Location

This fitness center is located in the integrated Aeropolis area, close to Soekarno-Hatta International Airport. This 105-hectare integrated area in Tangerang has residential, office, hotel, commercial, retail, and industrial facilities.

Going Anywhere is Easier

Transportation

  • Soekarno Hatta International Airport
  • Airport Express

Facilities

GYM

SWIMMING POOL

RESTAURANT

Food Arena

Shuttle Bus

Sports Club

Minimarket

Enter your information below
to get best deals from Aeropolis – Sports Club








    Aeropolis Sports Club

    If you want to find the most complete fitness Tangerang with modern equipment, just visit Aeropolis Sports Club. It’s the best gym Tangerang that provide decent gear for any purpose. For instance, this place offers aerobic, lift weight, and other various sports. Aeropolis Sports Club is a sport complex which consist of fitness center, swimming pool with Olympic size, and culinary area.

    Those various health facilities will help you to achieve quality life in different way. You can access those facilities by taking membership, or just pay per visit. Aeropolis Sports Club is a part mixed-use area of Aeropolis that consist of housing estate, office space, apartment, warehouse, fitness Tangerang center, and business center. Aeropolis is an integrated city, everything you need is already available, and mostly called as airport city

    Facilities

    Aeropolis Sports Club provides swimming pool which is very useful for you to swim after performing exercise at gym Tangerang. The pool is pretty wide and clean enough due to intensive care. It could be the right place for you to enjoy water attraction, whether you come alone or as a group. The pool is available in two different options, the children’s pool and the adult one. The children’s pool is equipped with some attractions, so you may bring your kid to swim or just to play. Other supported facilities such as exchange room, shower room, toilet, and locker room.

    The fitness equipment is pretty complete and modern with latest models in it to give you a comfortable feeling while during exercise at the gym Tangerang. The aerobic area is also convenience enough for you to perform several exercise with professional trainer that always happy to help you. Besides aerobic, several options for sport including yoga, Zumba, intro step, pilates, etc. All available in fixed schedule. All those facilities are provided to give you the best sport experience. Besides as gym Tangerang center, Aeropolis Sports Club also provides culinary attraction that dominated by local menu.

    Once you get tired after trying various equipment at fitness Tangerang or other activity, you can come by to Oryx Bistro to release your fatigue through food and beverage that they offer. Overall, this is a good place to fill your holiday with something different.

    Membership

    Aeropolis Sports Club offers affordable membership with different facilities for each type. At some type of membership, you may get free trainer that will help you in any occasion. Especially if you want to learn some basic technique and even the advanced one from the profesional fitness Tangerang. To use swimming pool as visitor, you will be charged as IDR 300.000 as single, while IDR 1.200.000 for corporate, and IDR 210.000 for student. Meantime as a member, you only need to pay IDR 100.000. And if you want to learn how to be a swimmer, there are several packages starting at IDR 75.000.

    To get access to the best gym Tangerang, there are four kind of memberships you can take. Such as monthly basis, three months, six months, and nine months. Each type has different facilities and price, starting at IDR 350.000 for the lowest, and IDR 2.075.000 for the highest package. By taking one type of membership, you are able to access every facilities inside Aeropolis Sports Club, including the best gym Tangerang. Just remember to stay informed, who know you may get a discount up to 20% for a limited time.

    Access

    Aeropolis Sports Club offers convenience nuance and strategic location, also accessible for any type of vehicles. It’s very advised to visit this place, besides comfortable nuance and the right place to hangout with your colleague, you will get different ambience while here. For your information, Aeropolis Sports Club opens every day starting at 06.00-21.00 WIB. During weekend, Aeropolis Sports Club always crowded by the visitors. You can reach this fitness Tangerang center at Neglasari, Tangerang, Banten.

    It’s less than five minutes to reach Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, and it has direct route to the airport. There are many shuttle busses to bring you everywhere on this city, or you may take a train. It’s an independent city that offer the most complete fitness Tangerang center. Overall, it’s recommended for you, especially if you live at the airport city, to try the most favorable gym Tangerang at Aeropolis Sports Club. It’s the center of fitness Tangerang with unusual scenery, which is the departure and the arrival every plane at Soekarno-Hatta Airport.
